Can I add my family members in the same login? I have placed an order on the app, is the order approved? Do I need to pay any charges for using this platform? Does your Organization guarantee any minimum return to the investor or give any indicative returns? How do I transfer my existing mutual fund holdings to Is my money transferred to you and then paid to the asset management company? What is the cut-off time to get same day NAV? How do I change my bank/contact details for my investments? Can I redeem or transact in the folios created online through local mutual fund company\'s office? I have been allotted units although the debit from my account was dishonoured? Yes You must go to your email given at the time of profile creation and check the email received from BSE/NSE with subject \"Order Authentication\". Follow the instructions given on the email. There are no usage charges taken from the investor for using this application. No, mutual fund investments are subject to market risk. Past performance does not guarantee future returns. Investors must assess their risk profile and consult a professional before investing. We will arrange a call back. Please send your request at No, your money is transferred to the Exchange (BSE/NSE) and then onwards to AMC (Asset Management Company). At no point is your money transferred to Normally, for liquid fund transactions cut-off is 1:30 p.m. and for other transactions it is 2:30 p.m. We can assist in updating your information. Please contact your Relationship Manager. Yes you can. Transactions below Rs. 2 lakhs get allotted before the funds are received. The transaction will be reversed in 5–7 workings days.

Holding Days Abs. Return Digital Mandate is a quick way to setup an Auto Pay method for your SIPs. A Code will be generated, which you can enter in your Bank Login for Authorization. No paper is involved. Some banks may not provide this facility. Paper Mandate will be sent over email to you. Please print, sign and send it to us for processing. Takes 4–5 weeks usually. Upload / Forward CAS Provide your CAS Consolidated Account Statement (CAS) consolidates your mutual fund investments across all AMCS. 1. Generate your CAS via Karvy or CAMS KARVY CAMS 2. Receive your CAS via email Karvy / CAMS will send the CAS to your email address. 3. Forward / Upload CAS to us Upload the CAS file received or forward it to also provide the password set while generating CAS. Note: Upload only detailed CAS generated from Karvy / CAMS CAS from NSDL and CDSL is not supported. Track old Investments Choose CAS Sharing Method 1. Forward If you have CAS on email then simply forward to us. 2. Upload If you have CAS on your phone then upload directly.
